meanings.sent1: The beautiful painting was frameable and looked perfect on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The certificate was frameable, so I decided to put it in a nice frame.
meanings.sent3: The funny picture of the cat wearing sunglasses was frameable and made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words were so frameable that they stayed in my mind long after she left.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was incredibly frameable, capturing the beauty of nature perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The vintage poster was frameable and added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The old photograph was frameable, so I decided to display it in a classic frame.
meanings.sent3: The quirky drawing of a dancing banana was surprisingly frameable and brought joy to the room.
meanings.sent4: His idea was so frameable that it became the centerpiece of the project.
meanings.sent5: The view from the mountaintop was incredibly frameable, like a postcard come to life.
